description:
Your Honor! We can start if you are ready. The court is yours and suspects’ fates will be determined by you. Be the Judge!

Be The Judge - Ethical Puzzles, Brain Games is a very funny version of brain test games. It will blow your brain out with its brain puzzles and riddles that you will crack the mystery. If you play the brain teaser games as Braindom 2 you will like this game. Find out the evidence, figure out who is guilty and who did it for what reason.

Are you willing to search for the main reasons behind the scene as a detective and trace the truth? Solve the mystery of the crime, find who is guilty and innocent in this law and court game and throw light on the cases. Become the riddle master in this object hunt game. Now you can judge!

There are lots of incidents and accidents in daily life that anyone may face with suspicion. Every day, every moment, someone is arrested with the suspicion of committing a crime and appears before a judge.

What will you do? Will you empathize with them and rule with your conscience and intelligence in the light of evidence or will you rule unmercifully? But first, you should find out the evidence as a detective. As you find the clue and solve the mystery, you are ready to judge in this object hunt game.

As you enlighten the cases, you will see options for a sentence or return a verdict of not guilty. Suspects robbed the bank, stole a bike, damaged property, and broke public decency. Find the hidden object or the clue to crack the mystery.

There are bonus levels for you to put yourself in their shoes. There are cases where you should act to save one while the other one suffers. Will you act ethically in these dilemmas?

Will you be a righteous judge? Are you ready to do what's right?

Game Features:

1. Original Scenarios
Each level brings you to hilarious or dramatic cases where you must figure out behind the scenes.

2. Test your Brain Power
Find the clues, solve the riddles, crack the mystery to trace and reach the truth.

3. Improve Yourself
You will see that incidents may not be as they appear at the first sight. This game will help you to improve your ability for empathy, common sense, and ethical approach.

4. Relax and Enjoy
Great time-killer game to enjoy as much as you play. You won’t want it to end.
